clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Astemizole was indicated for use in the relieving allergy symptoms particularly rhinitis and conjunctivitis It has been withdrawn from the market however due to concerns of arrhythmias

contraindications.disease: LD sub 50 sub 2052mg kg in mice
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Astemizole is a second generation H sub 1 sub receptor antagonist It does not significantly cross the blood brain barrier and therefore does not cause drowsiness or CNS depression at normal doses
